mapper.insert: insert into user_ (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_phone, user_card, user_role, user_adress, user_salary, user_grade, user_status, user_skill, user_credit, user_experience, user_age, user_gender, user_account_money) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userSkill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userExperience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userGender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userAccountMoney,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update user_ set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_card = #{userCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_role = #{userRole,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_adress = #{userAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_salary = #{userSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, user_grade = #{userGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_skill = #{userSkill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_credit = #{userCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_experience = #{userExperience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_age = #{userAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_gender = #{userGender,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_account_money = #{userAccountMoney,jdbcType=CHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_phone, user_card, user_role, user_adress, user_salary, user_grade, user_status, user_skill, user_credit, user_experience, user_age, user_gender, user_account_money from user_ where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_phone, user_card, user_role, user_adress, user_salary, user_grade, user_status, user_skill, user_credit, user_experience, user_age, user_gender, user_account_money from user_
select * from user_ where user_phone = #{phone} and user_password = #{password} and user_role = #{role}
select * from user_ where user_name = #{username} and user_role = #{role}

select * from user_ where user_phone = #{phone}
and user_role = #{role}
select * from user_ where user_card = #{usercard} and user_role = #{role}
